description: Create the ultimate flavour fusion by adding D'Orsogna Australian Jarrah Honey Ham Off The Bone to a creamy waldorf salad.
name: Ham Waldorf Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 6 slices Dâ€™Orsogna Premium Jarrah Honey Ham Off The Bone, torn

recipeInstructions.text: Cook potatoes in a large saucepan of boiling water for 10-15 minutes or until tender. Drain. Allow to cool. Cut into quarters.
Arrange the rocket, apples, celery, ham and potatoes on a large serving platter.
Sprinkle with walnut crumbs. Drizzle with dressing. Serve sprinkled with chives.
